doc.name: SubMatrix
doc.description:
This actor extract a submatrix from an input matrix. For example, if the input matrix is 
   1  2  3
   4  5  6
   7  8  9
then the parameters row = 1, column = 0, rowSpan = 2, and columnSpan = 1, yield the following submatrix 
   4
   7
If the submatrix specified is not entirely contained by the input matrix, or if the resulting submatrix is empty, then this actor will throw an exception.
doc.author: Edward Lee
doc.property: The starting column number. This is an integer that defaults to 0.
The span of columns. This is an integer that defaults to 1.
The starting row number. This is an integer that defaults to 0.
The span of rows. This is an integer that defaults to 1.
